references.paper_title: Learning transferable visual models from natural language supervision
references.reason: This paper introduces a model that learns transferable visual models from natural language supervision, which is fundamental to many of the models used in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Taming transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for taming transformers to synthesize high-resolution images, which is a key technique used in several models cited in the paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a method for high-resolution image synthesis using latent diffusion models, which is a crucial component of many models mentioned in the paper.
This paper introduces the concept of auto-encoding variational Bayes, a fundamental technique for VAEs that is central to the current paper.
This paper introduces the concept of neural discrete representation learning which is crucial to understanding many of the discrete VAE models discussed in the current paper.
